name: Realme 8
descrition: Realme 8 is a great device to get your gaming skills enhanced, with its MediaTek Helio G95 chipset and 6GB RAM. You can go on for long hours and take part in multiple championships with the 5000mAh battery compatible with 30W Fast Charging technology. Now, for those who are searching for great cameras, Realme has got their wish fulfilled by embedding powerful quad cameras on the backside teamed with a 16MP selfie-shooting lens.
